targets.expr: sum by (sfcluster) (rate(solidfire_node_read_ops_total{sfcluster=~"$cluster", node_name=~"$node"}[$interval])) + sum by (sfcluster) (rate(solidfire_node_write_ops_total{sfcluster=~"$cluster", node_name=~"$node"}[$interval]))
